meanings.definition: To connect or link two or more things together
meanings.sent1: I interconnect my phone to the charger every night.
meanings.sent2: The roads interconnect the different parts of the city.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces interconnect perfectly, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas interconnect seamlessly, forming a cohesive argument.
meanings.sent5: The train tracks interconnect, allowing trains to travel smoothly.
